dmca.title: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3398475W] Pyrexcelwebdesign.com - unauthorized use of my copyrig
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2007 10:48 AM To: zzzzzz Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3398475W] Pyrexcelwebdesign.com - unauthorized use of my copyrighted work ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Pyrexcelwebdesign.com - unauthorized use of my copyrighted work Added by system at Thursday, Mar 8 2007 04:38 pm X-MailFrom: myukmailbox@yahoo.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; b=zebgMBEg9LGrDImUkiRsHepUIqvQIuPSEzXUANkx0pdJuardVS57Q65NMF1WueDYoXhNap aXOuLlR3l6Rna5kYLjmnZSMtu7XEACcR1QoJUGuI+f2A8V2qxUbC7mmOglkIPe/FAhrEM9HT dfO0RpM+D8eklvsj/sVHWy6jF8zAE=; X-YMail-OSG: vEu0SEkVM1lb84kv7XECZ4y_j3CA.A.seul5YX6ZksQV63uoUsIYSfaqq9wQxEeQhUjj6Pst qQL9NVIvVol9iXKjHNVN99yC1jaVYnydmlTsbcgRJKzZtyq0ZbE9IDnzy96Vyk_TwHpgR7Hd PXB8Xlw- Received: from [88.105.233.163] by web25705.mail.ukl.yahoo.com via HTTP; Thu, 08 Mar 2007 22:38:08 GMT Date: Thu, 8 Mar 2007 22:38:08 +0000 (GMT) From: Storecart Web Services Reply-To: sclarke@rentacart.co.uk Subject: Pyrexcelwebdesign.com - unauthorized use of my copyrighted work To: abuse@theplanet.com Cc: legal@rentacart.co.uk MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-2000950229-1173393488=:99027" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Message-ID: <104195.99027.qm@web25705.mail.ukl.yahoo.com> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Mar 2007 22:38:29.0312 (UTC) FILETIME=[7E497C00:01C761D2] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Abuse Team It has come to my attention that your company is hosting a site who has unauthorized use of my copyrighted work and images from my website www.rentacart.co.uk The site in question is owned by: www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com Administrative Contact: bada, Babatunde Whois Privacy and Spam Prevention by DomainTools.com BBada uk 32 Thrayle House Benedict Road London, Armed Forces Other Areas SW9 0XU United Kingdom 07751201080 I have tried to contact this site owner for the past 4 months now but does not respond to emails, Live chat, phone or letters. I have reserved all rights in the Work, first published in December 2005, and have registered copyright therein. Some pages of this site is essentially identical to the work and clearly used the Work as its basis. http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/ecommerce-shopping-carts-and-affordable -ecommerce-hosting.htm Has been taken from: www.rentacart.co.uk and www.rentacart.co.uk/about_rentacart.htm Even the images he is using our our clients www.dvdloon.com www.numberplategifts.co.uk This page here http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/affordable-ecommerce-hosting.htm Is a copy of http://www.rentacart.co.uk/Options.html Even the terms and conditions have been copied, if you took through you will even see OUR BUSINESS ADDRESS. ''Web Services in writing to: Pyrexcel Web design Web design web services - 2 Clarendon Court - Clarendon Street - NEWPORT - IOW - PO301QZ.'' tAKEN FROM http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/ecommerce-terms-and-policy.html SECTION - DATA PROTECTION As the site owner they neither asked for nor received permission to use the Work. I believe they have willfully infringed my rights under 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein. I request that you immediately remove all infringing works derived from the Work of myself from your servers. If I have not received an affirmative response from you within 14 days indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements, I shall take further action against you. I Appreciate your understanding in this matter Regards, Mr S B Clarke Storecart Web Services www.rentacart.co.uk T 0870 286 9350 F 0870 286 9348 This communication is confidential to Storecart Web Services and is intended for use only by the addressee. Storecart Web Services accepts no responsibility for information, errors or omissions in this communication or use or misuse thereof or any act done or omitted to be done in connection with the same. STORECART WEB SERVICES - PO BOX 166 - NEWPORT - PO30 9BB Rentacart.co.uk is a trading name of Storecart Web Services. A Member of the UKWDA and FSB. --------------------------------- New Yahoo!
